com.randallscharpf.java.jmorsecoding.base.playerinterfaces

Interface Delayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Beeper
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Delayer
    A means of waiting. In some contexts, spinning or sleeping the current thread is an appropriate choice; in other contexts, it makes more sense to merely indicate to a scheduler or device the required timing. Implementations may choose to use the most situationally efficient code, the most situationally accurate code, or some tradeoff between these potential extremes.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void wait(java.time.Duration time)
      Waits for some amount of time.

    • Method Detail

      • wait

        void wait(java.time.Duration time)
   throws java.lang.Exception
        Waits for some amount of time. This method may block until the waiting is completed or indicate to some other thread or some device that the waiting should occur and then return immediately.
        Parameters:
        time - a Duration giving the amount of time to wait
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the waiting is unable to be demanded or completed
        Since:
        1.0
